meanings.definition: To cover or decorate with tinsel.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys tinselling the Christmas tree every year.
meanings.sent2: The children were tinselling the classroom for the holiday party.
meanings.sent3: The cat ended up tinselling itself with the shiny decorations.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter tinselled the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The sun tinselled the water with a golden glow.

meanings.definition: The act of adding tinsel to something.
meanings.sent1: The tinselling of the tree made it sparkle.
meanings.sent2: She admired the tinselling on the holiday wreath.
meanings.sent3: The tinselling on the cake added a festive touch.
meanings.sent4: His words were like tinselling on a plain conversation.
meanings.sent5: The tinselling on her dress caught the light beautifully.
